data.eml:eml: Cosmosycanus perelegans (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Harpactorinae), a new record from China, with report of its female genitalia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhao, Ping, Ren, Shuzhi, Wang, Baohai, Cai, Wanzhi (2015): Cosmosycanus perelegans (Hemiptera: Reduviidae: Harpactorinae), a new record from China, with report of its female genitalia. Zootaxa 3936 (4): 567-574, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.4.6
